TopicTitle: Looking for someone who can model my game's ships in KSP

Articles.Content:
Hi there! 

I am on a team working on building a space strategy MMO. On launch we will be releasing three ships:
- Light Transport
- Heavy Transport
- Shuttle

I am looking for someone who could take our 3D models and covert them into ships/parts for KSP for people to be able to test out and fly around :) 

Not sure if you are open to this, but would love to chat further!

Thanks,
Jean-Paul
